result: Hervé Boutemy has worked on various topics related to Maven and Apache projects. Some of the topics he has been involved in include discussions on migrating shared components into separate projects, managing the Maven site, handling skins such as maven-default-skin and maven-fluido-skin, working on projects like Surefire and Wagon, and addressing the challenges of migrating an aggregator tree into a collection of Git repositories. Additionally, he has participated in ApacheCon events where he discussed topics like the impact of Java 9 on Maven projects and the evolution of Java with respect to Maven usage. Hervé Boutemy's contributions demonstrate his involvement in diverse aspects of Maven and Apache project management and development.
